subject: Horse Racing
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: An accident during a race not long afterward ruined his career as a jockey, but Kevin Wirth again feels connected to animals. This time it is a connection with a fishing rod, not tack.
snippet: An accident during a race not long afterward ruined his career as a jockey, but Kevin Wirth again feels connected to animals. This time it is a connection with a fishing rod, not tack.
